Title: Allows persons with disabilities and their immediate family to access state parks and recreational facilities without charge
Summary: Allows persons with disabilities and their immediate family to access state parks and recreational facilities without charge.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง13.22, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to access to state parks and recreational facilities by persons with a disability without charge
